channel.title: Docker on Green Reed Technology - Technology without boundaries

item.title: Useful Docker Commands
item.description:
Docker (https://www.docker.com/) is arguably the most popular container platform and this post covers a number of useful Docker commands from basic commands about viewing system information to viewing logs of docker containers. Additional commands can be found at the Docker docs website (https://docs.docker.com/engine/reference/commandline/cli/) or via the command line help.

Docker Version

View the version of docker installed on the system. Both the client and server version are listed.
